title: Imposes mandatory sentence of imprisonment for theft of motor vehicle
summary: Imposes mandatory sentence of imprisonment of five years for grand larceny of a motor vehicle; provides that such term shall run consecutively with any other term imposed by the court; imposes certain plea bargaining restrictions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to providing for mandatory terms of imprisonment for grand larceny of a motor vehicle
